status.description: The development status of the setting. When missing, this property is inherited from parent nodes. If no parent node defines it, the default value is 'STABLE'.

VkFormatFeatureFlagBits.description: The platforms where the setting is available. When missing, this property is inherited from parent nodes. If no parent node defines it, the default value is all platforms.

VkFormatFeatureFlagBits2KHR.description: The platforms where the setting is available. When missing, this property is inherited from parent nodes. If no parent node defines it, the default value is all platforms.

platforms.description: The platforms where the setting is available. When missing, this property is inherited from parent nodes. If no parent node defines it, the default value is all platforms.
